msbt.message: Reckon I just saw you puttin' away a shovel, kiddo. Wouldn't happen to be huntin' for treasure, would ya? Wouldn't blame you if you were. Reckon you probably heard the same tale of a fortune buried around here. Gah! I've said too much! Seein' as how I've been seekin' that treasure, I shouldn't be helpin' you find it first!
Doin' some waterin', ?

Nice umbrella you got there, kiddo. Didja know some folks call 'em "bumbershoots"? Not me, . I just call 'em umbrellas because I like to keep it simple. But I'm a big fan either way. Fans Reckon I just had a million-Bell idea! Picture this: an umbrella, with a fan whirrin' away under it! It could dry you off if you got wet openin' your umbrella. Or cool you off, if you just opened it for shade! Reckon I'm gonna pitch this one to Tom Nook himself!

Did I just see you holdin' an axe? Good thing you seem to be the type who knows how to swing it properly. Go on and use that axe as much as you need to clear out some space for . We need all the space we can get, !
Hey now! Is that a slingshot? What do you think you're gonna shoot with that? Gahaha! Don't worry about it. Just let me know when you find a good target!
Hey now! Is that thing you got there one of those wands? I hear they're real helpful.All it takes is one flick of the wrist and—BAM!—you've changed your clothes! Boy, ain't life grand?

Heya, !Did I just see you layin' down some new roads to speed up development?I like havin' lots of new streets to stroll down. Turns my dull ol' walks into an adventure!Ehjust make sure these newfangled roads are nice and smooth, OK? Bumpy paths make my hips ache!
Saw that tool you were just holdin'. Reckon you've been buildin' some cliffs around here, That's some serious business there. Can't wait to see how it turns out!

My keen sense of observin' tells me you've been makin' rivers. What a feelin', eh? Now, I ain't gonna tell you what to do, but I suggest you don't get too fancy with this river business. Don't want to end up with a maze of rivers that's hard to get around, if you catch myDRIFT. Gahaha!

Don't try to pull the wool over my eyes, kiddo. That party popper you're holding can only mean one thing Someone's celebrating something somewhere! Gahaha!Now, who is it? And where's all the fun happenin'? Go on. You can tell your ol' pal, !
Usin' that to go explorin'?Those come in handy for scramblin' up and down cliffs. Just make sure to be careful about it, . If you aren't on stable ground it can wobble, and that's dangerous!
Look at you with your vaultin' pole! Ain't no river stoppin' you today.Must be a blast to vault yourself around like that. I know I'd leap at the chance to try it, .
A tweeter?! Whoa! I ain't seen one of them inI don't know how long!Gotta be careful not to blast 'em with too much air, though, or they might not roll back up, !

Havin' fun with that bubble maker? Y'know, I read that how a fella makes bubbles can say a lot about 'em.For instance, if you're into focusin' on one huge bubble, you probably enjoy a tall glass of .But if you like flingin' bubbles out all willy-nilly, maybe you're the type, .Me? Well, I ain't really enamored of bubbles, but this loves him . Gahaha!
That's a swell pinwheel you've got there, .Just be careful when you're makin' it spin, alright? They make me dizzy.
My arm's getting tired just thinking about you fannin' yourself with that tiny old thing,
Careful where you swing that sparkler, kiddo. Those things can be dangerous, !
Seein' you with that balloon reminds me of when I was a strapping young , .Of course, I'm still a strapping young . I just ain't got a balloon now. Gahaha!

Heya. I hear you've been tryin' to catch bugs. I also hear you haven't had a lick of luck. A little advice Don't panic! Them critters can sense it a mile away. Makes 'em jittery. Scares 'em off! Take a deep breath. Maybe try some meditation. You'll start catchin' 'em in no time, .
How's the bug catching goin'? Guessin' maybe not so good.Try not to let thatBUG ya. Gahaha!There's plenty of critters waitin' to be caught. You'll get the hang of it!

Hey, kiddo. Looks like you've gotten pretty decent at catchin' bugs.Now, don't you go getting cocky! The moment you get too comfortable, THAT'S when you're likely to slip up. What I mean is, don't be like me. One time, I let my big ego bumble a rare catch. I regret it to this day!
Well look at you, catchin' all sortsa bugs, !Seems like I see you runnin' around with a net in your hand all the time these days. I better up my game, !
Creepin' critters! I heard you caught every single kind of bug there is! Not bad, kiddo. Not bad at all. Looks like it's time for me to hang up my net. I lost to you fair and square, !

Hey there, have the fish been bitin'?<10_4 /> You haven't caught a single one?Well now, there's no use gettin' worked up about it. That'll just scare 'em away! Anglin' ain't for the impatient. Take your time, !

Heya, .How's the fishin' goin'?<10_4 /> Not so swimmingly, by the looks of it.Well, like they say, "There are plenty of fish in the sea." Of course, they also say, "Fish or cut bait." Look, they say a lot of things. But I say, stick with it. You'll be swimming in fish in no time, !

Looks like you've turned into a real fine angler, kiddo!But, as a wise man once said, don't count your fish before they're spawned.<10_4 /> That wise man was me! Hmmcome to think of it, I don't recollect why I said that. I'm sure I had a real good reason, though.
I see you've taken quite a shine to fishin', !The fish don't stand a chance when you've got that rod in your hand.You might say you're a real fishin' aFISHionado. Gahaha!

You're a legend, !Everyone's talkin' about how you caught every kind of fish there is!I understand if you don't want to give away the secret of your wild success But if you tell me, mum's the word! Angler's honor, !
Waterin', on a day like today? You take your chores seriously!I'd take the day off from that, if I had my druthers. Gahaha!
So that's why the flowers around here are always lookin' extra perky. It's all your doin', .
